name: Retro Shooter (FreeZucchini)
description:
A 2D shooter made with Unity using the Warped Caves assets and some custom made assets. The mechanics in this game are based of the Sega game Contra. Download and extract the zip file and clip on the file named "Retro Shooter" not "Retro Shooter_Data".

Keyboard Controls:

A and D or Left and Right for movement.

Space for Jump

Left Click for Shoot

Right Click for Crouch

W for Shoot Up

Controller/Gamepad Controls:

Left Joystick for movement 

B(Xbox) or Square(PS) for Jump

A(Xbox) or X(PS) for Shoot

Left Trigger 2 for Crouch

Point the Left Joystick up to Shoot Up
